cuDining.title: Alfred Packer Grill
cuDining.overview: Alferd Packer Grill in the UMC is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, offering everything from a huge salad bar and paninis to freshly made tacos and chef-inspired daily specials.
cuDining.paymentAccepted: Credit/Debit, Campus Cash, Meal Plan, Munch Money

cuDining.title: Center for Community
cuDining.overview: This award-winning dining center offers an exciting fusion of community and cultural dining experiences featuring 10 micro-restaurants that create a culinary experience for customers that both educates and engages the senses.
cuDining.paymentAccepted: Credit/Debit, Campus Cash, Meal Plan, Munch Money

cuDining.title: CU on the Run Grab-n-Go
cuDining.overview: CU on the Run, located in C4C, features both hot and cold options as well as a made-to-order sandwich station for when you’re on the go.
cuDining.paymentAccepted: Credit/Debit, Campus Cash, Meal Plan, Munch Money

cuDining.title: Farrand Market
cuDining.overview: Located in the heart of campus, Farrand Market is a fast-paced late-night store with a large selection of beverages, hot and ready meal options, quick snacks and student essentials.
cuDining.paymentAccepted: Credit/Debit, Campus Cash, Meal Plan, Munch Money

cuDining.title: Kittredge Market
cuDining.overview: Located in Kittredge Central, north wing, Kittredge Market offers a full-service espresso and tea bar, on-the-go breakfast and lunch options and a general market with snacks, drinks and essentials.

cuDining.title: SEEC Cafe
cuDining.overview: The SEEC Café is located at Research Park in the Sustainability, Energy and Environment Community (SEEC) building. This restaurant serves breakfast and lunch daily and is known for its noodle and rice bowls, full-service espresso bar and daily, chef-inspired lunch specials.
cuDining.paymentAccepted: Credit/Debit, Campus Cash, Meal Plan, Munch Money

cuDining.title: Sewall Dining Center
cuDining.overview: Sewall Dining Center is located in Sewall Hall on the north side of campus. Sewall has four separate meal stations which serve multicultural meal options, traditional “comfort” food, pizza and items right off the grill.
cuDining.paymentAccepted: Credit/Debit, Campus Cash, Meal Plan, Munch Money

cuDining.title: Sewall Market
cuDining.overview: Sewall Market is a convenience store on the northeast corner of central campus, offering bottled beverages, hot coffee, snacks, sandwiches, salads, ice cream and student essentials.

cuDining.title: Starbucks
cuDining.overview: Conveniently located at the UMC, our full-service Starbucks offers hot and iced beverages, blended coffees, pastries, on-the-go meal options, snacks, whole beans and Starbucks merchandise.

cuDining.title: The Bakery
cuDining.overview: Located in the Center for Community (C4C) first floor, The Bakery features responsibly sourced specialty coffees, made-from-scratch pastries and on-the-go lunch options.

cuDining.title: The Grotto
cuDining.overview: Our newest restaurant in the recently opened Village Center offers burgers, milkshakes, baked and shaked tots and a variety of fun beverages. It's the perfect spot to hang out on game days and awards nights with TVs and large screen media display.
